dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Nothing beats using the bathroom when you are really desperate.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I felt the comfortable shiver of emptying my bladder. It was nice to be able to relax for once in my life without the fear of being harassed by crazy people.

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: Takeshi-Kun, come on we need to go.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I screamed as I turned around to the girl standing behind me.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni-Chan!? What are you doing!? This is the men’s room!

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: Ah don’t worry about that! Justice takes precedence over such small technicalities.
